pageProduct.name: QV Heel Balm 50G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Feet Heel Balm uses an effective blend of an alpha hydroxy acid and rich moisturisers to help revive the appearance of rough, dry and cracked heels. By exfoliating dead and dry skin, QV Feet Heel Balm will leave rough feet feeling soft and smooth.

Warnings

CAUTION:
For external use only.  Keep out of reach of children.  If irritation occurs, use less often.  If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult your podiatrist or other healthcare professional.  Do not use on inflamed skin or open wounds. Avoid eyes. Store below 30°C.

Common Uses

• Urea-free, low-irritant formulation.
• Free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol.
• Suitable for other areas of dry, toughened skin, such as knees, elbows and hands.

Ingredients

Aqua (water) sodium lactate, stearic acid, lactic acid, cetearyl alcohol, paraffinum liquidum, petrolatum, PEG-100 (and) glyceryl stearate, sodium polyacrylate xanthan gum, methylparaben, propylparaben.

Directions

Apply balm morning and night until skin has returned to normal. Once normal skin has returned, apply 2-3 times a week to help maintain the skin.
